docstr: `IBCLR` â€” Clear bit ### Description `IBCLR` returns the value of `I` with the bit at position `POS` set to zero. ### Syntax `RESULT = IBCLR(I, POS)` ### Arguments . | `POS` | The type shall be `INTEGER`. ### Return value The return value is of type `INTEGER` and of the same kind as `I`. ### Standard Fortran 95 and later ### Class Elemental function ### See also IBITS, IBSET, IAND, IOR, IEOR, MVBITS
